default_model: vllm-llama3-8b-instruct

bert_model:
  model_id: models/mom-embedding-light
  threshold: 0.6
  use_cpu: true

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"  # Options: "memory", "milvus", or "hybrid"
  similarity_threshold: 0.8
  max_entries: 1000  # Only applies to memory backend
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  eviction_policy: "fifo"
  # HNSW index configuration (for memory backend only)
  use_hnsw: true  # Enable HNSW index for faster similarity search
  hnsw_m: 16  # Number of bi-directional links (higher = better recall, more memory)
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200  # Construction parameter (higher = better quality, slower build)

  # Hybrid cache configuration (when backend_type: "hybrid")
  # Combines in-memory HNSW for fast search with Milvus for scalable storage
  # max_memory_entries: 100000 # Max entries in HNSW index (default: 100,000)
  # backend_config_path: "config/milvus.yaml" # Path to Milvus config

  # Embedding model for semantic similarity matching
  # Options: "bert" (fast, 384-dim), "qwen3" (high quality, 1024-dim, 32K context), "gemma" (balanced, 768-dim, 8K context)
  # Default: "bert" (fastest, lowest memory)
  embedding_model: "bert"

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

prompt_guard:
  enabled: true  # Global default - can be overridden per category with jailbreak_enabled
  use_modernbert: true
  model_id: "models/mom-jailbreak-classifier"
  threshold: 0.7
  use_cpu: true
  jailbreak_mapping_path: "models/mom-jailbreak-classifier/jailbreak_type_mapping.json"

# Classifier configuration
classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    use_modernbert: true
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
    category_mapping_path: "models/mom-domain-classifier/category_mapping.json"
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/pii_classifier_modernbert-base_presidio_token_model"
    use_modernbert: true
    threshold: 0.7
    use_cpu: true
    pii_mapping_path: "models/mom-pii-classifier/pii_type_mapping.json"

keyword_rules:
  - name: "thinking"
    operator: "OR"
    keywords: ["urgent", "immediate", "asap", "think", "careful"]
    case_sensitive: false

# Router Configuration for Dual-Path Selection
router:
  # High confidence threshold for automatic LoRA selection
  high_confidence_threshold: 0.99
  # Low latency threshold in milliseconds for LoRA path selection
  low_latency_threshold_ms: 2000
  # Baseline scores for path evaluation
  lora_baseline_score: 0.8
  traditional_baseline_score: 0.7
  embedding_baseline_score: 0.75
  # Success rate calculation threshold
  success_confidence_threshold: 0.8
  # Large batch size threshold for parallel processing
  large_batch_threshold: 4
  # Default performance metrics (milliseconds)
  lora_default_execution_time_ms: 1345
  traditional_default_execution_time_ms: 4567
  # Default processing requirements
  default_confidence_threshold: 0.95
  default_max_latency_ms: 5000
  default_batch_size: 4
  default_avg_execution_time_ms: 3000
  # Default confidence and success rates
  lora_default_confidence: 0.99
  traditional_default_confidence: 0.95
  lora_default_success_rate: 0.98
  traditional_default_success_rate: 0.95
  # Scoring weights for intelligent path selection (balanced approach)
  multi_task_lora_weight: 0.30  # LoRA advantage for multi-task processing
  single_task_traditional_weight: 0.30  # Traditional advantage for single tasks
  large_batch_lora_weight: 0.25  # LoRA advantage for large batches (≥4)
  small_batch_traditional_weight: 0.25  # Traditional advantage for single items
  medium_batch_weight: 0.10  # Neutral weight for medium batches (2-3)
  high_confidence_lora_weight: 0.25  # LoRA advantage for high confidence (≥0.99)
  low_confidence_traditional_weight: 0.25  # Traditional for lower confidence (≤0.9)
  low_latency_lora_weight: 0.30  # LoRA advantage for low latency (≤2000ms)
  high_latency_traditional_weight: 0.10  # Traditional acceptable for relaxed timing
  performance_history_weight: 0.20  # Historical performance comparison factor
  # Traditional model specific configurations
  traditional_bert_confidence_threshold: 0.95  # Traditional BERT confidence threshold
  traditional_modernbert_confidence_threshold: 0.8  # Traditional ModernBERT confidence threshold
  traditional_pii_detection_threshold: 0.5  # Traditional PII detection confidence threshold
  traditional_token_classification_threshold: 0.9  # Traditional token classification threshold
  traditional_dropout_prob: 0.1  # Traditional model dropout probability
  traditional_attention_dropout_prob: 0.1  # Traditional model attention dropout probability
  tie_break_confidence: 0.5  # Confidence value for tie-breaking situations

# Reasoning family configurations
reasoning_families:
  deepseek:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "thinking"

  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

  gpt-oss:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"
  gpt:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"

# Global default reasoning effort level
default_reasoning_effort: high

# API Configuration
api:
  batch_classification:
    max_batch_size: 100
    concurrency_threshold: 5
    max_concurrency: 8
    metrics:
      enabled: true
      detailed_goroutine_tracking: true
      high_resolution_timing: false
      sample_rate: 1.0
      duration_buckets:
        [0.001, 0.005, 0.01, 0.025, 0.05, 0.1, 0.25, 0.5, 1, 2.5, 5, 10, 30]
      size_buckets: [1, 2, 5, 10, 20, 50, 100, 200]

# Embedding Models Configuration
# These models provide intelligent embedding generation with automatic routing:
# - Qwen3-Embedding-0.6B: Up to 32K context, high quality,
# - EmbeddingGemma-300M: Up to 8K context, fast inference, Matryoshka support (768/512/256/128)
embedding_models:
  qwen3_model_path: "models/mom-embedding-pro"
  gemma_model_path: "models/mom-embedding-flash"
  use_cpu: true  # Set to false for GPU acceleration (requires CUDA)

# Observability Configuration
observability:
  tracing:
    enabled: false  # Enable distributed tracing for docker-compose stack
    provider: "opentelemetry"  # Provider: opentelemetry, openinference, openllmetry
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"  # Export spans to Jaeger (via OTLP gRPC)
      endpoint: "jaeger:4317"  # Jaeger collector inside compose network
      insecure: true  # Use insecure connection (no TLS)
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"  # Sampling: always_on, always_off, probabilistic
      rate: 1.0  # Sampling rate for probabilistic (0.0-1.0)
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "development"

intent: Configuration ai-gateway deployment
use_case: Configuration for ai-gateway deployment
full_config:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: vllm-semantic-router-system

intent: Configuration with semantic caching, with routing decisions, with PII detection
use_case: Configuration for unknown deployment
full_config:
# Configuration for hallucination detection benchmark
# Connects to real vLLM server at port 8083

bert_model:
  model_id: models/mom-embedding-light
  threshold: 0.6
  use_cpu: true

semantic_cache:
  enabled: false  # Disable cache for benchmarking

# Classifier configuration
classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    use_modernbert: true
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
    category_mapping_path: "models/mom-domain-classifier/category_mapping.json"
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/pii_classifier_modernbert-base_presidio_token_model"
    use_modernbert: true
    threshold: 0.7
    use_cpu: true
    pii_mapping_path: "models/mom-pii-classifier/pii_type_mapping.json"

# Hallucination mitigation configuration
hallucination_mitigation:
  enabled: true

  # Fact-check classifier: determines if a prompt needs fact verification
  fact_check_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-halugate-sentinel"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true

  # Hallucination detector: verifies if LLM response is grounded in context
  # Using base model (149M params) for balanced accuracy and speed
  hallucination_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-halugate-detector"
    threshold: 0.5
    use_cpu: true

  # NLI model: provides explanations for hallucinated spans
  nli_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-halugate-explainer"
    threshold: 0.7
    use_cpu: true

  # Action when hallucination detected: "warn" adds headers, "block" returns error
  on_hallucination_detected: "warn"

# Fact-check rules for signal classification
# The classifier outputs one of these signals that can be referenced in decision conditions
fact_check_rules:
  - name: needs_fact_check
    description: "Query contains factual claims that should be verified against context"
  - name: no_fact_check_needed
    description: "Query is creative, code-related, or opinion-based - no fact verification needed"

# Prompt guard
prompt_guard:
  enabled: true
  use_modernbert: true
  model_id: "models/mom-jailbreak-classifier"
  threshold: 0.7
  use_cpu: true
  jailbreak_mapping_path: "models/mom-jailbreak-classifier/jailbreak_type_mapping.json"

# vLLM endpoint - real vLLM server
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "vllm-general"
    address: "127.0.0.1"
    port: 8083
    weight: 1
    health_check_path: "/health"

# Model configuration - use the actual model from vLLM
model_config:
  "Qwen/Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-AWQ":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["vllm-general"]

# Categories for routing
categories:
  - name: general
    description: "General questions"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: math
    description: "Mathematics and quantitative reasoning"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: science
    description: "Science questions"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics", "chemistry", "biology"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "math_decision"
    description: "Mathematics and quantitative reasoning"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "math"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "Qwen/Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-AWQ"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: []
      - type: "hallucination"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          use_nli: true
          hallucination_action: "header"
          unverified_factual_action: "header"
          include_hallucination_details: false

  - name: "science_decision"
    description: "Science questions"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "science"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "Qwen/Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-AWQ"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: []
      - type: "hallucination"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          use_nli: true
          hallucination_action: "header"
          unverified_factual_action: "header"
          include_hallucination_details: false

  - name: "general_decision"
    description: "General questions"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "general"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "Qwen/Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-AWQ"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: []
      - type: "hallucination"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          use_nli: true
          hallucination_action: "header"
          unverified_factual_action: "header"
          include_hallucination_details: false

default_model: "Qwen/Qwen2.5-14B-Instruct-AWQ"

# API Configuration
api:
  batch_classification:
    metrics:
      enabled: true
      detailed_goroutine_tracking: true
      high_resolution_timing: false
      sample_rate: 1.0

intent: Route queries using phi4 model, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with observability, with 7 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for quickstart deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, observability
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_2"
    address: "172.20.0.5"
    port: 8001
    weight: 1

model_config:
  "phi4":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_2"]

categories:
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: engineering
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["engineering"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: history
    description: "History related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["history"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "philosophy_decision"
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "philosophy"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a philosophy expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.78

  - name: "engineering_decision"
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "engineering"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a engineering expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.91

  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.71

  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.74

  - name: "history_decision"
    description: "History related queries"
    priority: 40
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "history"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a history expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: phi4

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"
  similarity_threshold: 0.78
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "quickstart"

reasoning_families:

    parameter: "enable_thinking"

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true

  similarity_threshold: 0.76
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true

classifier:

full_config:

categories:

    rules:

    modelRefs:

        - type: "domain"

intent: Route queries using gpt-oss-20b model, in dynamic-config deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with tool selection, with observability, with 10 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for dynamic-config deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, tools
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_1"
    address: "192.168.1.100"
    port: 8000
    weight: 3

model_config:
  "gpt-oss-20b":
    reasoning_family: "gpt-oss"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_1"]

categories:
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: psychology
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["psychology"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "math_decision"
    description: "Math related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "math"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a math expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.75

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.89

  - name: "psychology_decision"
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "psychology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a psychology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.74

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.79

  - name: "other_decision"
    description: "Other related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "other"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a other expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.86

  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "computer_science_decision"
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    priority: 40
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "computer_science"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a computer_science expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.81

  - name: "law_decision"
    description: "Law related queries"
    priority: 30
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "law"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a law expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "philosophy_decision"
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    priority: 20
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "philosophy"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a philosophy expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 10
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: gpt-oss-20b

reasoning_families:
  gpt-oss:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "milvus"
  similarity_threshold: 0.88
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger-collector:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "dynamic-config"

intent: Route queries using openai/gpt-oss-20b model, in istio deployment, with PII detection, with 9 routing decisions

full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_4"
    address: "10.10.10.20"
    port: 8080
    weight: 1

model_config:
  "openai/gpt-oss-20b":
    reasoning_family: "gpt-oss"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_4"]

categories:
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: engineering
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["engineering"]
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: psychology
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["psychology"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "openai/gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

intent: Route queries using deepseek model, in ai-gateway deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with tool selection, with 3 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for ai-gateway deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, tools
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_1"
    address: "10.10.10.20"
    port: 8001
    weight: 3

model_config:
  "deepseek":
    reasoning_family: "deepseek"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_1"]

categories:
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.89

  - name: "computer_science_decision"
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "computer_science"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a computer_science expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.95

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: deepseek

reasoning_families:
  deepseek:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "milvus"
  similarity_threshold: 0.83
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

intent: Route queries using qwen3 model, in istio deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with tool selection, with 11 routing decisions

full_config:
vllm_endpoints:

    address: "127.0.0.1"
    port: 8002
    weight: 1

model_config:
  "qwen3":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_5"]

categories:
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: history
    description: "History related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["history"]
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "philosophy_decision"
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "philosophy"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "qwen3"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"

      - type: "pii"

          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

    priority: 90

    modelRefs:
      - model: "qwen3"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a math expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"

          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.85

  - name: "physics_decision"

        - type: "domain"

    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"

      - type: "pii"

      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:

          similarity_threshold: 0.79

  - name: "health_decision"
    description: "Health related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"

        - type: "domain"

    modelRefs:
      - model: "qwen3"

    plugins:

      - type: "pii"

  - name: "business_decision"

    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:

    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"

      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true

  - name: "biology_decision"

default_model: qwen3

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "redis"
  similarity_threshold: 0.78
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9

tools:

intent: Route queries using gpt-oss-20b model, in dynamic-config deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with observability, with 3 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for dynamic-config deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, observability
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_4"
    address: "192.168.1.100"
    port: 8080
    weight: 3

model_config:
  "gpt-oss-20b":
    reasoning_family: "gpt-oss"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_4"]

categories:
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.72

  - name: "other_decision"
    description: "Other related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "other"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a other expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: gpt-oss-20b

reasoning_families:
  gpt-oss:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"
  similarity_threshold: 0.72
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger-collector:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "dynamic-config"

    reasoning_family: "gpt-oss"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_3"]

categories:
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: psychology
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["psychology"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: engineering
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["engineering"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "psychology_decision"
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "psychology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a psychology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "law_decision"
    description: "Law related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "law"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a law expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "math_decision"
    description: "Math related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "math"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a math expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "other_decision"
    description: "Other related queries"
    priority: 40
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "other"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a other expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "health_decision"
    description: "Health related queries"
    priority: 30
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "health"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a health expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "engineering_decision"
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    priority: 20
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "engineering"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a engineering expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 10
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "gpt-oss-20b"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

default_model: gpt-oss-20b

reasoning_families:
  gpt-oss:
    type: "reasoning_effort"
    parameter: "reasoning_effort"

default_reasoning_effort: high

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

intent: Route queries using phi4 model, in ai-gateway deployment, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with tool selection, with observability, with 3 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for ai-gateway deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, tools
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_2"
    address: "192.168.1.100"
    port: 8000
    weight: 2

model_config:
  "phi4":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_2"]

categories:
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.86

  - name: "math_decision"
    description: "Math related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "math"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a math expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.87

  - name: "law_decision"
    description: "Law related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "law"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a law expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: phi4

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "redis"
  similarity_threshold: 0.71
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger-collector:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "ai-gateway"

      deployment_environment: "ai-gateway"

    description: "Psychology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["psychology"]
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "psychology_decision"
    description: "Psychology related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "psychology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "mistral"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a psychology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.78

  - name: "philosophy_decision"
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "philosophy"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "mistral"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a philosophy expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "math_decision"
    description: "Math related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "math"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "mistral"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a math expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.87

  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "mistral"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "mistral"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.89

  - name: "computer_science_decision"
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "computer_science"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "mistral"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a computer_science expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.78

default_model: mistral

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "hybrid"
  similarity_threshold: 0.84
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: "config/tools_db.json"
  fallback_to_empty: true

intent: Route queries using deepseek model, with semantic caching, with PII detection, with 10 routing decisions
use_case: Configuration for quickstart deployment with semantic_cache, pii_detection, routing_decisions
full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_2"
    address: "10.0.0.50"
    port: 8080
    weight: 3

model_config:
  "deepseek":
    reasoning_family: "deepseek"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_2"]

categories:
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: history
    description: "History related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["history"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: other
    description: "Other related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["other"]
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: engineering
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["engineering"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "health_decision"
    description: "Health related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "health"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a health expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "history_decision"
    description: "History related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "history"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a history expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.8

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 80
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "computer_science_decision"
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    priority: 70
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "computer_science"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a computer_science expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "business_decision"
    description: "Business related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "business"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.9

  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 50
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a economics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "other_decision"
    description: "Other related queries"
    priority: 40
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "other"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"

          system_prompt: "You are a other expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.75

  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 30
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 20
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.76

  - name: "engineering_decision"
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    priority: 10
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "engineering"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "deepseek"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a engineering expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

default_model: deepseek

reasoning_families:
  deepseek:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "memory"
  similarity_threshold: 0.83
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

    address: "127.0.0.1"
    port: 11434
    weight: 1

model_config:
  "phi4":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_3"]

categories:
  - name: chemistry
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["chemistry"]
  - name: biology
    description: "Biology related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["biology"]
  - name: history
    description: "History related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["history"]
  - name: computer_science
    description: "Computer_science related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["computer_science"]
  - name: health
    description: "Health related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["health"]
  - name: law
    description: "Law related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["law"]
  - name: engineering
    description: "Engineering related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["engineering"]
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: physics
    description: "Physics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["physics"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "chemistry_decision"
    description: "Chemistry related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "chemistry"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a chemistry expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"
      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.82

  - name: "biology_decision"
    description: "Biology related queries"
    priority: 90
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "biology"

      - model: "phi4"

    plugins:

        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a biology expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."

  - name: "history_decision"

        - type: "domain"

    plugins:

  - name: "health_decision"

    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "health"
    modelRefs:

  - name: "physics_decision"
    description: "Physics related queries"
    priority: 20
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "physics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "phi4"
        use_reasoning: true
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a physics expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"

          enabled: true
          similarity_threshold: 0.92

default_model: phi4

reasoning_families:
  qwen3:
    type: "chat_template_kwargs"
    parameter: "enable_thinking"

default_reasoning_effort: high

semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: "milvus"
  similarity_threshold: 0.81
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600

classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-domain-classifier"
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  pii_model:
    model_id: "models/mom-pii-classifier"
    threshold: 0.9
    use_cpu: true

observability:
  metrics:
    enabled: true
  tracing:
    enabled: true
    provider: "opentelemetry"
    exporter:
      type: "otlp"
      endpoint: "jaeger:4317"
      insecure: true
    sampling:
      type: "always_on"
      rate: 1.0
    resource:
      service_name: "vllm-semantic-router"
      service_version: "v0.1.0"
      deployment_environment: "quickstart"

full_config:
vllm_endpoints:
  - name: "endpoint_1"

    port: 8002
    weight: 3

model_config:
  "qwen3":
    reasoning_family: "qwen3"
    preferred_endpoints: ["endpoint_1"]

categories:
  - name: economics
    description: "Economics related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["economics"]
  - name: philosophy
    description: "Philosophy related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["philosophy"]
  - name: business
    description: "Business related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["business"]
  - name: math
    description: "Math related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["math"]
  - name: history
    description: "History related queries"
    mmlu_categories: ["history"]

strategy: "priority"

decisions:
  - name: "economics_decision"
    description: "Economics related queries"
    priority: 100
    rules:
      operator: "AND"
      conditions:
        - type: "domain"
          name: "economics"
    modelRefs:
      - model: "qwen3"
        use_reasoning: false
    plugins:
      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:

      - type: "pii"

    plugins:

      - type: "system_prompt"
        configuration:
          system_prompt: "You are a business expert. Provide accurate and helpful responses."
      - type: "pii"

          enabled: true

    priority: 70

        - type: "domain"

    modelRefs:

      - type: "pii"

      - type: "semantic-cache"
        configuration:

          similarity_threshold: 0.78

  - name: "history_decision"
    description: "History related queries"
    priority: 60
    rules:
      operator: "AND"

        - type: "domain"

    modelRefs:

      - type: "pii"
        configuration:
          enabled: true
          pii_types_allowed: "[]"

config:
connection:
  host: localhost
  port: 6379
  database: 0
  password: ''
  timeout: 30
  tls:
    enabled: false
    cert_file: ''
    key_file: ''
    ca_file: ''
index:
  name: semantic_cache_idx
  prefix: 'doc:'
  vector_field:
    name: embedding
    dimension: 384
    metric_type: COSINE
  index_type: HNSW
  params:
    M: 16
    efConstruction: 64
search:
  topk: 1
logging:
  level: info
  enable_query_log: false
  enable_metrics: true
development:
  drop_index_on_startup: true
  auto_create_index: true
  verbose_errors: true
intent: Configuration with semantic caching with simplified routing

config:
bert_model:
  model_id: models/mom-embedding-light
  threshold: 0.6
  use_cpu: true
semantic_cache:
  enabled: false
classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: models/mom-domain-classifier
    use_modernbert: true
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
    category_mapping_path: models/mom-domain-classifier/category_mapping.json
  pii_model:
    model_id: models/pii_classifier_modernbert-base_presidio_token_model
    use_modernbert: true
    threshold: 0.7
    use_cpu: true
    pii_mapping_path: models/mom-pii-classifier/pii_type_mapping.json
hallucination_mitigation:
  enabled: true
  fact_check_model:
    model_id: models/mom-halugate-sentinel
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
  hallucination_model:
    model_id: models/mom-halugate-detector
    threshold: 0.5
    use_cpu: true
  nli_model:
    model_id: models/mom-halugate-explainer
    threshold: 0.7
    use_cpu: true
  on_hallucination_detected: warn
fact_check_rules:
- name: needs_fact_check
  description: Query contains factual claims that should be verified against context
- name: no_fact_check_needed
  description: Query is creative, code-related, or opinion-based - no fact verification
    needed
prompt_guard:
  enabled: true
  use_modernbert: true

config:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Namespace
metadata:
  name: vllm-semantic-router-system
tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: config/tools_db.json
  fallback_to_empty: true
intent: Configuration ai-gateway deployment with tools auto-selection added

config:
bert_model:
  model_id: models/mom-embedding-light
  threshold: 0.6
  use_cpu: true
semantic_cache:
  enabled: true
  backend_type: memory
  similarity_threshold: 0.8
  max_entries: 1000
  ttl_seconds: 3600
  eviction_policy: fifo
  use_hnsw: true
  hnsw_m: 16
  hnsw_ef_construction: 200
  embedding_model: bert
tools:
  enabled: true
  top_k: 3
  similarity_threshold: 0.2
  tools_db_path: config/tools_db.json
  fallback_to_empty: true
prompt_guard:
  enabled: true
  use_modernbert: false
  model_id: models/mom-jailbreak-classifier
  threshold: 0.7
  use_cpu: true
  jailbreak_mapping_path: models/mom-jailbreak-classifier/jailbreak_type_mapping.json
vllm_endpoints:
- name: endpoint1
  address: 172.28.0.20
  port: 8002
  weight: 1
model_config:
  qwen3:
    reasoning_family: qwen3
    preferred_endpoints:
    - endpoint1
classifier:
  category_model:
    model_id: models/mom-domain-classifier
    use_modernbert: false
    threshold: 0.6
    use_cpu: true
    category_mapping_path: models/mom-domain-classifier/category_mapping.json
  pii_model:
    model_id: models/pii_classifier_modernbert-base_presidio_token_model
    use_modernbert: false
    threshold: 0.7
    use_cpu: true
    pii_mapping_path: models/mom-pii-classifier/pii_type_mapping.json
categories:
- name: business
  description: Business and management related queries
  mmlu_categories:
  - business
- name: law
  description: Legal questions and law-related topics
  mmlu_categories:
  - law
- name: psychology
  description: Psychology and mental health topics
  mmlu_categories:
  - psychology
- name: biology
  description: Biology and life sciences questions
  mmlu_categories:
  - biology
- name: chemistry
  description: Chemistry and chemical sciences questions
  mmlu_categories:
  - chemistry
- name: history
  description: Historical questions and cultural topics
  mmlu_categories:
  - history
- name: other
  description: General knowledge and miscellaneous topics
  mmlu_categories:
  - other
- name: health
  description: Health and medical information queries
  mmlu_categories:
  - health
- name: economics
  description: Economics and financial topics
  mmlu_categories:
  - economics
- name: math
  description: Mathematics and quantitative reasoning
  mmlu_categories:
  - math
- name: physics
  description: Physics and physical sciences
  mmlu_categories:
  - physics
- name: computer_science
  description: Computer science and programming
  mmlu_categories:
  - computer_science
- name: philosophy
  description: Philosophy and ethical questions
  mmlu_categories:
  - philosophy
- name: engineering
  description: Engineering and technical problem-solving
  mmlu_categories:
  - engineering
strategy: priority
decisions:
- name: business_decision
  description: Business and management related queries
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: business
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a senior business consultant and strategic advisor with
        expertise in corporate strategy, operations management, financial analysis,
        marketing, and organizational development. Provide practical, actionable business
        advice backed by proven methodologies and industry best practices. Consider
        market dynamics, competitive landscape, and stakeholder interests in your
        recommendations.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: law_decision
  description: Legal questions and law-related topics
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: law
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a knowledgeable legal expert with comprehensive understanding
        of legal principles, case law, statutory interpretation, and legal procedures
        across multiple jurisdictions. Provide accurate legal information and analysis
        while clearly stating that your responses are for informational purposes only
        and do not constitute legal advice. Always recommend consulting with qualified
        legal professionals for specific legal matters.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: psychology_decision
  description: Psychology and mental health topics
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: psychology
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a psychology expert with deep knowledge of cognitive
        processes, behavioral patterns, mental health, developmental psychology, social
        psychology, and therapeutic approaches. Provide evidence-based insights grounded
        in psychological research and theory. When discussing mental health topics,
        emphasize the importance of professional consultation and avoid providing
        diagnostic or therapeutic advice.
  - type: semantic-cache
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      similarity_threshold: 0.92
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: biology_decision
  description: Biology and life sciences questions
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: biology
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a biology expert with comprehensive knowledge spanning
        molecular biology, genetics, cell biology, ecology, evolution, anatomy, physiology,
        and biotechnology. Explain biological concepts with scientific accuracy, use
        appropriate terminology, and provide examples from current research. Connect
        biological principles to real-world applications and emphasize the interconnectedness
        of biological systems.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: chemistry_decision
  description: Chemistry and chemical sciences questions
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: chemistry
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: true
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a chemistry expert specializing in chemical reactions,
        molecular structures, and laboratory techniques. Provide detailed, step-by-step
        explanations.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: history_decision
  description: Historical questions and cultural topics
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: history
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a historian with expertise across different time periods
        and cultures. Provide accurate historical context and analysis.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: health_decision
  description: Health and medical information queries
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: health
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a health and medical information expert with knowledge
        of anatomy, physiology, diseases, treatments, preventive care, nutrition,

        professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always encourage users

  - type: semantic-cache
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      similarity_threshold: 0.95
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: economics_decision
  description: Economics and financial topics
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: economics
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are an economics expert with deep understanding of microeconomics,
        macroeconomics, econometrics, financial markets, monetary policy, fiscal policy,
        international trade, and economic theory. Analyze economic phenomena using
        established economic principles, provide data-driven insights, and explain
        complex economic concepts in accessible terms. Consider both theoretical frameworks
        and real-world applications in your responses.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: math_decision
  description: Mathematics and quantitative reasoning
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: math
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3

    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: physics_decision
  description: Physics and physical sciences
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND

    - type: domain
      name: physics
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: true
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a physics expert with deep understanding of physical
        laws and phenomena. Provide clear explanations with mathematical derivations
        when appropriate.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: computer_science_decision
  description: Computer science and programming
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND

    - type: domain
      name: computer_science
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a computer science expert with knowledge of algorithms,
        data structures, programming languages, and software engineering. Provide
        clear, practical solutions with code examples when helpful.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: philosophy_decision
  description: Philosophy and ethical questions
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: philosophy
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt
    configuration:
      system_prompt: You are a philosophy expert with comprehensive knowledge of philosophical
        traditions, ethical theories, logic, metaphysics, epistemology, political
        philosophy, and the history of philosophical thought. Engage with complex
        philosophical questions by presenting multiple perspectives, analyzing arguments
        rigorously, and encouraging critical thinking. Draw connections between philosophical
        concepts and contemporary issues while maintaining intellectual honesty about
        the complexity and ongoing nature of philosophical debates.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: engineering_decision
  description: Engineering and technical problem-solving
  priority: 100
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: engineering
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
  - type: system_prompt

        engineering disciplines including mechanical, electrical, civil, chemical,
        software, and systems engineering. Apply engineering principles, design methodologies,
        and problem-solving approaches to provide practical solutions. Consider safety,
        efficiency, sustainability, and cost-effectiveness in your recommendations.
        Use technical precision while explaining concepts clearly, and emphasize the
        importance of proper engineering practices and standards.
  - type: pii
    configuration:
      enabled: true
      pii_types_allowed: []
- name: general_decision
  description: General knowledge and miscellaneous topics
  priority: 50
  rules:
    operator: AND
    conditions:
    - type: domain
      name: other
  modelRefs:
  - model: qwen3
    use_reasoning: false
  plugins:
